field.name: Source, Latitude
field.description: Latitude of the source, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Source, Longitude
field.description: Longitude of the source, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Waypoint %1%, Latitude
field.description: Latitude of the Waypoint %1%, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Waypoint %1%, Longitude
field.description: Longitude of the Waypoint %1%, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Destination, Latitude
field.description: Latitude of the destination, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Destination, Longitude
field.description: Longitude of the destination, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

parametrizedCommand.name: Remove Waypoint
parametrizedCommand.description: Removes a waypoint from the route.

parameter.name: WaypointIndex
parameter.description: Waypont to remove from the list.

simpleCommand.name: Remove Source
simpleCommand.description: Removes the source information from the route.

simpleCommand.name: Remove Destination
simpleCommand.description: Removes the destination information from the route.

simpleCommand.name: Clear Points
simpleCommand.description: Removes all waypoints as well as the source and the destination from the route.

parametrizedQuery.name: Add Waypoint
parametrizedQuery.description: Adds a point to the route.

parameter.name: Type
parameter.description: Type of point to add. Possible values are: `Source`, `Destination`, `Waypoint`.

parameter.name: Latitude
parameter.description: Latitude of the point, in degrees.

parameter.name: Longitude
parameter.description: Longitude of the point, in degrees.

parameter.name: Altitude
parameter.description: Altitude of the point, using the same unit as that provided by the altitude fields.
